parameters.query: DELETE FROM sector_overview WHERE as_of_date = CURRENT_DATE;

INSERT INTO sector_overview (sector_norm, as_of_date, bullish_score, bearish_score, avg_change_pct, avg_volspike)
SELECT
    COALESCE(b.sector, br.sector) AS sector_norm,
    CURRENT_DATE AS as_of_date,
    AVG(b.score) AS bullish_score,
    AVG(br.score) AS bearish_score,
    AVG(COALESCE(b.changePct, br.changePct)) AS avg_change_pct,
    AVG(COALESCE(b.volSpike, br.volSpike)) AS avg_volspike
FROM bullish_detail_flat b
FULL OUTER JOIN bearish_detail_flat br ON b.sector = br.sector
GROUP BY COALESCE(b.sector, br.sector);
